services.details: Detailed haircut (lineup included) with a straight razor shave.
Beard trim and lineup with a straight razor shave.
Straight razor shave with hot towel.

faqs.question: Do you accept walk-ins?
faqs.answer: Yes, we accept walk-ins but appointments are preferred.

faqs.question: What forms of payment do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept cash and all major credit cards—including Apple Pay and Android Pay—for online appointments. For walk-ins, only cash is accepted.

faqs.question: Do you cut kids' hair?
faqs.answer: Yes, we can accommodate children of all ages.

faqs.question: Where are you located?
faqs.answer: Our studio is located in Fontana, CA near the 10 freeway off of the Sierra Ave exit. Since we operate by appointment-only, the exact address will be sent via text and email once you've confirmed your appointment.
